body: @AudriusButkevicius, @mikioh the fix is pretty easy.  If you want to do it yourself I have posted the code snipit on https://github.com/golang/go/issues/12811.  If you want the entire file, let me know.  I will be happy to share it.  I don't have time or the desire to set up and go through Gerrit, so I will just post it on a Google Shared Drive or on my GitHub page if you want.
